title: Won’t You Take a Break?
detail_text: <:th_ch0003/>Eli-chan~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>My, what’s the matter, Kotori? I’m sorry, but I still have student council work to do so I can’t go to the club. Is there a problem?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>No, it’s not that, but I heard from Nozomi-chan that you have been pushing yourself too hard recently, Eli-chan….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Geez, that Nozomi…. It’s not that much, so it’s fine<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>But, won’t you take a bit of a break? I bought ice creams♪ If you don’t eat it right away, then it’ll melt~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Eeh!? Geez…. Fufu, I guess it can’t be helped. Then, I’ll pour some tea<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Hey hey, Eli-chan, do you want chocolate or vanilla?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>What about you, Kotori?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Me? Hmm…. Maybe…. Vanilla? But chocolate is sure to taste good too…. What should I pick~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Then, how about we each take half<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Yaay! I love you, Eli-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
